general.description: Kinder Station is an outpost for Za'lek ships and scientists. In the factional struggle amongst the Za'lek, Kinder station is considered to be neutral territory, as it straddles much of the various factions' holdings without being too deep in any of them.
general.bar: The tension in the bar is high, as several representative from the various factions mee tto talk over their differances. There are virtually no fights, as there seems to be several armed guards keeping a close eye on everything. You are conciously avoided by everyone here.
